job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><u>Description:</u></strong></p><ul><li>We’re prioritizing full-stack with more <strong>backend heavy experience</strong></li><li>For front-end folks HTML/CSS/JavaScript expertise (React is what we use)</li><li>Strong experience with scripting languages such as JavaScript / Python</li><li>Experience with AWS, Lambda, serverless, SQL</li></ul><p><br></p>
